EmailTemplate.name: Newsletter - Partner Q2 2015.Q2 draft C
EmailTemplate.subject: Our Tricentis Partner Newsletter Q2, 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Q2/2015 Tricentis Partner Newsletter What a thrilling year 2015 has been already! We have participated in several exciting accomplishments, not the least being the official launch of Tosca Testsuite 8.4. We are pleased to share with you our recent news and look forward to continuing in successful partnership with you. If you want to learn more about what we have been up to, or have ideas about how to better partner with Tricentis, feel free to contact us at info@tricentis.com <mailto:info@tricentis.com>. Join our upcoming webinars!
Das 1x1 der Testautomatisierung (German) July 28, 2015 10:00-11:00 AM CEST Register Here <http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/webinar-test-automatisierung-fur-anfanger-20150728/>
Test Automation for Beginners July 28, 2015 5:00-6:00 PM CEST Register Here <http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/webinar-test-automation-for-beginners-20150728/> The Tricentis team is excited to present our new Tosca Testsuite 8.4 Release. We’ve introduced many new features to enhance the overall Tosca Testsuite experience such as the new ribbon navigation Tosca Commander UX, Test Case Design Relations, AJAX Synchronization, Tosca Continuous Integration, and many more. To read more about the new Tricentis Tosca Testsuite 8.4, click here <http://www.tricentis.com/tricentis-tosca-testsuite/what-is-new/8-4-0/>!
Tosca Testsuite Service Pack 8.4.1
We are already looking ahead to our Tosca Testsuite Service Pack 8.4.1 release, where Tricentis will be bringing out even more features to make sure you’ll be able to spend less time testing and more time enjoying summer. Join us for Tricentis’ highly anticipated What’s New in Release 8.4.1 webinar this August to hear more about the new features available in this release.
Register for our What’s New in Tosca Testsuite 8.4.1 webinars here <http://www.tricentis.com/software-testing-webinars/>! Partner Day 2015 October 21
We are also offering a Partner Day on October 21st in conjunction with Accelerate 2015. The event will feature a technical update on Tosca Testsuite, as well as an overview of the Partner Program for 2015/2016. You will be informed of any changes and new programs important to you, our partners, as well as an open platform for discussion about how Tricentis can best support you. Click here <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate/partner-day-reg/> to register for the Partner Day.
Accelerate 2015 October 22
ccelerate 2015 is drawing nearer and we are more excited than ever about everything we have to offer. Join us on October 22nd in Vienna, Austria for a day of networking, presentations, and discussions with influencers and test automation pros from around the world. We look forward to seeing you there! For more information and to register, click here <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate/>!
This box will be deleted
Gartner Newsletter
Tricentis has recently publishing a newsletter in conjunction with Gartner on the topic of mobile testing. The newsletter, “Testing the Future of Mobile Applications” discusses how Tricentis Tosca Testsuite provides end-to-end testing solutions in the midst of increasing demands on mobile developers, faster time-to-market, and testing complexity. The newsletter also includes a Gartner research note, the “Market Guide for Mobile Application Testing”. Download the newsletter here <http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/testing-the-future-of-mobile-applications/>!
Webinars
In an effort to continually be offering new and helpful resources, we have lined up an exciting series of webinars featuring our own Tricentis experts and an array of impressive guest speakers. Make sure to check out our Events Page <http://www.tricentis.com/software-testing-webinars/> to stay up to date on our webinars! Upcoming Conferences
German Testing Day July 15-17, 2015 Frankfurt, Germany Register Here <http://www.germantestingday.info?utm_medium=email&utm_source=news_p>
Agile 2015 August 3-7, 2015 Washington D.C., USA Register Here <http://agile2015.agilealliance.org/registration?utm_medium=email&utm_source=news_p> Please add Tricentis to your address book: info@tricentis.com <mailto:info@tricentis.com> <https://plus.google.com/108151335013813449490/posts> <https://www.facebook.com/TRICENTIS> <https://twitter.com/Tricentis> <https://www.linkedin.com/company/tricentis-technology-&-consulting-gmbh>
